settings.title: 1. Guidance for a Safe and Enriching Experience
settings.text:
While it is not possible to oversee the conduct of each participant, we strongly recommend following these principles before, during, and after your experience with Venna:

  • Ensure your personal belongings and beverages are always under your supervision.
  • Consume alcohol in moderation to maintain clarity and control.
  • Share personal information only with people you trust.
  • Report any suspicious or inappropriate behaviour immediately to report@venna.com.
  • Avoid transferring money or sharing financial information with other participants.
  • If you feel uncomfortable at any point, immediately inform a restaurant staff member or, if necessary, leave the premises of the event.

settings.title: 2. Registrations and Bookings
settings.text:
How to Register
  1. Click the "Become a Member" button, complete the form, and create your free account.
  2. After registering, you can edit your form responses in your personal account area.
Registration Deadlines

Thursday Dinners:
Registrations open every Friday morning for the following Thursday's dinner and close on Tuesday at 11:59 PM.

Sunday Brunches:
Registrations open every Monday morning for the following Sunday’s brunch and close on Friday at 11:59 PM.

Compatibility and Booking Confirmation:

After the registration deadline (11:59 PM), we begin creating the ideal group for your experience.

Active plan subscribers must:

  • Log into their account.
  • Select the desired city and date within the registration deadlines mentioned above.

If a booking is not confirmed, participation is assumed to be cancelled, your spot will not be reserved, and no refund will be provided.

Additional Policies:
  • Registrations made outside Venna's official website may be declined and are not eligible for refunds.
  • To gift a membership to a friend or family member, the recipient must complete the Personality Assessment. Otherwise, the gift will be unusable, and no refunds will be issued to either party.

These policies ensure our commitment to quality and organised experiences.

settings.title: 3. Event Details
settings.text:
When do the events take place?

Dinners:
Every Thursday.

Brunches:
Every Sunday.

Both events last two hours.

Location and Timing Information:

Venue and timing details are sent via email.

Restaurant Payments:
  • Each participant is responsible for paying their own bill at the restaurant.
  • Venna is not liable for the cost of restaurant bills.
Group Selection:
  • Groups are composed of 6 to 8 people.
  • Selections are made manually, ensuring a balanced mix of ages, genders, languages, and dietary preferences.
Restaurant Selection:
  • Restaurants are carefully curated by Venna or in partnership with Fugaz&Co to provide high-quality experiences.
  • There is a chance of repeated restaurants for subscribers, but group compositions are never repeated.

If an event falls on 25th December (Christmas) or 1st January (New Year’s Day), it might not be held due to restaurant closures or existing bookings on those dates.

settings.title: 4. Plans, Cancellations, and Renewals
settings.text:
Cancellation Policy:
  • Cancellations are permitted up to 72 hours before the event for One Time plans.
  • No refunds are issued, but you may reschedule for the following week in the same city.
Automatic Renewal:
  • All subscriptions are automatically renewed unless cancelled prior to the renewal date.

settings.title: 5. Communication and Feedback
settings.text:
Upon joining, you will receive:

  • A purchase confirmation email.
  • An email with details about the time and venue.
  • A follow-up email after the experience to share your feedback.

If you fail to receive any of those, please email us at support@vennavenn.com

settings.title: 6. Privacy and Security
settings.text: Member privacy is our top priority. No personal information is shared with third parties.

settings.title: 7. Changes to Terms of Use
settings.text: Venna reserves the right to modify the terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.

settings.title: 8. Contact Information
settings.text:
For questions about the privacy policy or other information, please get in touch:

  • Email: contact@venna.com

Welcome to the Venna community, and enjoy our uniquely curated experiences!
